channel.title: Address Already In Use: JUM_Bind
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Please Help Me With this Address Already In Use: JUM_Bind[/size]
[size=10pt]It's the Address Already in Use: JUM_Bind[/size] I'm not sure how to fix, but everytime i run my runescape private server, it won't run because It says "Adress Already in Use: JUM_Bind".... please freaking help leave a reply.

item.title: Address Already In Use: JUM_Bind
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Kyla_xX Xx_Kyla_xX
item.description:
@Xx_Kyla_xX wrote:

Scape-JAVA i’m new to the whole thing, so like where do i put that at?

int tr=1;if (setsockopt(listener,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&tr,sizeof(int)) == -1) { perror("setsockopt"); exit(1);}
Where i put it?

Read full topic

item.title: Address Already In Use: JUM_Bind
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Try restarting your computer, or use this.

[code=java]
int tr=1;

if (setsockopt(listener,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&tr,sizeof(int)) == -1) {
perror(“setsockopt”);
exit(1);
}[/code]

That will allow you to reuse the port.

Credits to hitori on another forum.

Read full topic
